WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please, for this type of question, open a «Discussion» instead of an «Issue».
WorkItem.Description:
I am having a problem applying Adobe Reader and Flash updates now using the msp files. Can you please advise on how to get these updates installed.  I get a not applicable for the status in WSUS package publisher.

Thanks,

Comments.Message: I have figured out to get the updates to show up

2 servers 2008R2. On each, wsus + wup (version 1.3.1511.15)

On the first one, patches run successfully.
examples : (Adobe Reader XI update 13, Adobe Reader DC AcroRdrDCUpd1501020056.msp)  

On the second one, with exactly same patches, Package Publisher says : "Not Applicable"

On stations using second server, manually install is OK
msiexec /p AcroRdrDCUpd1501020056.msp /qn 

Any idea ?
Regards

HI!

I have the same problem.

Regards
Sabine
